name: Christmas Tree - Match It Game
description:
Free decoration: Build the perfect Christmas Tree of this holidays! Decorate your tree with a huge assortment of ornaments! It fits your device size and you can share it with your friends wherever you go! Then relax in joyous delight to realistic animated snow, shimmery animated garlands, and your favorite holiday songs!

Match It: Colors and shapes mode - for your children to identify colors and shapes while they decorates the tree! A fun interactive learning game helps preschoolers and kindergartner to elementary school students to study different colors and shapes. It is child-friendly and easy to play learning games that kids play and learn independently. Bright colors and shapes that are easy for young children to recognize. This learning game is perfect for kids to learn color words such as red, yellow, blue, green, and shape words as circle, star, etc.

Key features:
- Universal applications - runs full screen on all Apple devices
- 3 game modes: Free decoration, Match It: colors, Match It: shapes
- Export finished tree to photo album and email it (or share on Facebook) directly to friends and family
- 4 holiday songs including favorites (classical and popular)
- Animated snowfall, garlands, sparklers, candles
- Colourful high resolution Retina graphics
- Dozens of ornaments and colors
- 2 tree styles
- Easy controls

Happy Holidays!

The Starship Studio crew are committed to provide free high quality learning games to help young kids build up learning skills and have fun!
